mapper.select: select salary_id, organize_id, organize_name, staff_id, staff_name, work_date, work_days, off_days, deduct_count, insurance_count, allowance_count, salary_count, comment from employee_salary where salary_id = #{salaryId}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_salary(organize_id, organize_name, staff_id, staff_name, work_date, work_days, off_days, deduct_count, insurance_count, allowance_count, salary_count, comment) values (#{organizeId}, #{organizeName}, #{staffId}, #{staffName}, #{workDate}, #{workDays}, #{offDays}, #{deductCount}, #{insuranceCount}, #{allowanceCount}, #{salaryCount}, #{comment})

insert into employee_salary(organize_id, organize_name, staff_id, staff_name, work_date, work_days, off_days, deduct_count, insurance_count, allowance_count, salary_count, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.workDate}, #{entity.workDays}, #{entity.offDays}, #{entity.deductCount}, #{entity.insuranceCount}, #{entity.allowanceCount}, #{entity.salaryCount}, #{entity.comment})

insert into employee_salary(organize_id, organize_name, staff_id, staff_name, work_date, work_days, off_days, deduct_count, insurance_count, allowance_count, salary_count, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeId}, #{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.staffName}, #{entity.workDate}, #{entity.workDays}, #{entity.offDays}, #{entity.deductCount}, #{entity.insuranceCount}, #{entity.allowanceCount}, #{entity.salaryCount}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update organize_id = values(organize_id), organize_name = values(organize_name), staff_id = values(staff_id), staff_name = values(staff_name), work_date = values(work_date), work_days = values(work_days), off_days = values(off_days), deduct_count = values(deduct_count), insurance_count = values(insurance_count), allowance_count = values(allowance_count), salary_count = values(salary_count), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update employee_salary
organize_id = #{organizeId},
organize_name = #{organizeName},
staff_id = #{staffId},
staff_name = #{staffName},
work_date = #{workDate},
work_days = #{workDays},
off_days = #{offDays},
deduct_count = #{deductCount},
insurance_count = #{insuranceCount},
allowance_count = #{allowanceCount},
salary_count = #{salaryCount},
comment = #{comment},
where salary_id = #{salaryId}
